name: Artisan Sourdough Loaf
description: Crusty outside, soft and airy inside. Fermented for 48 hours.
custom_explanation: Our sourdough starter is 5 years old, giving this bread a distinct, tangy flavor profile that pairs perfectly with soups.

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: Buttery, flaky pastry filled with rich dark chocolate batons.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Moist muffin bursting with fresh organic blueberries.

name: Cinnamon Roll
description: Swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with cream cheese frosting.
custom_explanation: Served warm, these rolls are gooey, sticky, and the ultimate comfort food for a rainy day.

name: Everything Bagel
description: New York style boiled bagel topped with sesame, poppy, onion, and garlic.

name: French Baguette
description: Classic long thin loaf with a crisp crust.

name: Strawberry Tart
description: Shortcrust pastry filled with custard and topped with glazed strawberries.

name: Gluten-Free Brownie
description: Fudgy, rich chocolate brownie made with almond flour.
custom_explanation: We use high-quality cocoa powder and almond flour to ensure these are safe for gluten-sensitive customers without sacrificing taste.
